articles.title: Two survivors of Mexico kidnapping recovering in US hospitals - BBC
articles.description: One of them has gunshot wounds and two of their friends were killed by gangs at a Mexico border town.
articles.content:
Two surviving Americans who were were kidnapped at gunpoint in Matamoros, Mexico last week are being treated at US hospitals. 
Their two friends who were also abducted died during the incident.

articles.title: Covid's effect on mental health not as great as first thought, study suggests - The Guardian

articles.title: Early childhood lower respiratory tract infection and premature adult death from respiratory disease in Great Britain: a national birth cohort study - The Lancet
articles.description:
In this prospective, life-spanning, nationally representative cohort study, LRTI during
early childhood was associated with almost a two times increased risk of premature
adult death from respiratory disease, and accounted for one-fifth of these deaths.
